articles.description: Most business interruption policies in South Africa aren't valid for the coronavirus outbreak, regulators say, and they're not about to make insurance companies pay up.
articles.title: SA insurers are keen to scrap pandemic coverage, not so keen to pay for Covid-19 interruption - Business Insider South Africa
articles.content:
• Most business interruption insurance policies in South Africa require physical damage before they kick in. The coronavirus will not do it, regulators say.
